summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5596 for the improvement of 17th Avenue Southwest, from Delridge Way to West Roxbury Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73650 as amended by Ordinance No. 73789, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
